text: Hi everyone! how to develop an app in a local environment in visual studio, how to connect HubSpot with visual studio? your help will be appreciated. thanks

Hey there, if this is your first time building on HubSpot I recommend <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/getting-started>

After that
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/creating-an-efficient-development-workflow>
